cont.entity_a: Effectively retrieves data from old zip disks.
cont.entity_b: Performs well with no issues over six months.

cont.entity_a: Provides automatic backup of key files.
cont.entity_b: Included backup software is awkward and not very configurable.

cont.entity_a: No special software is required for operation.
Uses disks with a 750MB capacity, suitable for smaller files.
cont.entity_b: Provides good value for money with 500GB storage.

cont.entity_a: No longer has web support from the Iomega company.
cont.entity_b: Customer service from SimpleTech is poor, with slow response times.

cont.entity_a: A USB cord is used for connection instead of another connector.
Purchased as a replacement for a previous model that lasted over 13 years.
A replacement was needed due to a failure after several weeks.
cont.entity_b: Performance deteriorated after initial use, with some units failing quickly.

cont.entity_a: The product was received used and non-functional instead of new.
cont.entity_b: Some units arrived defective or became defective shortly after purchase.
The SimpleTech drive has a sleek design and runs quietly.
Not recommended as a portable device due to the AC input requirement.
The setup is simple, and file transfer is easy.
